ValidationRule.description: Amount is required to move to Qualification
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Contains($Profile.Name, "Sales"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , "Trial")), OR( ISBLANK( Incremental_ARR__c ), ISBLANK(CloseDate) ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "1 - Qualify Opportunity"), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), TEXT(Lead_Created_Date__c) <> "" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incremental ARR and Closed Date are required to move to Qualify Opportunity. The Opportunity Incremental ARR is the change to the Account ARR. For NB, it is the contract value. For expansion, this is the delta. For flat renewals, IARR is 0.
